articles.description: Dean McCullough and Vicky Hawkesworth will present their new afternoon show from Salford.
articles.content:
Dean McCullough and Vicky Hawkesworth have been announced as the replacements for Scott Mills, who is leaving Radio 1 after 24 years.
The pair's new afternoon show will be the station's latest weekd… [+3119 chars]

articles.description: Marie Helvin, 69, who lives in London, told the Third Act podcast that she's struggling financially and would even consider applying for a job as a supermarket cashier.
articles.content:
